description:
Position would require the candidate to be a W2 employee of Donatech.
US Citizenship/Permanent Resident Required. #RemotePosition

• Analyze inventory reports daily to anticipate inventory problems and/or shortages, future supply, and logistical needs
• Execute, Monitor, and address issues with PO submission for applicable raw material & device suppliers
• Ensure timely availability of consolidated forecast to RMD Category Managers for submission to suppliers
• Oversight and maintenance of Suppliers’ order confirmations to ensure ERP system alignment
• Supports recovery plans and network allocations in shortage situations
• Support QC prioritization in conjunction with site as needed
• Creates and maintains source master data in SAP and Rapid Response
• Review network-wide master data and address issues with appropriate data owners to ensure accuracy and consistency across sites
• Find opportunities to optimize order management (e.g. order consolidation, order frequency, minimum order quantities, etc.)
• Serves as primary interface with Global and Site Planning for supplier order prioritization as needed
Other responsibilities include:
• Maintain excellent communication lines with all sources of demand and supply
• Effectively engage key partners within supply chain, quality, finance, process development and other functional areas as needed
• Provide ad hoc reporting to support network
• Develop and/or deliver reports, presentations and/or recommendations to executive audiences
• Serve as a Supply Chain resource and/or representative for special projects and initiatives
• Work under minimal supervision in line with client Values and Leadership Attributes

Basic Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree and 2 years of experience in Supply Chain
Or
Associate degree and 6 years of experience in Supply Chain
Or
High school diploma / GED and 10 years of experience in Supply Chain

Preferred Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in engineering, business management or life science or advanced degree
• Demonstrated experience in a continuous improvement role applying tools, methodologies and change management (i.e. Lean, Six Sigma)
• Demonstrated experience leading product teams.
• Demonstrated ability to exercise independent judgment and establish and maintain working relationships with a variety of individuals and groups
• Proven communication and facilitation and project management skills
• Demonstrated experience in SAP and RapidResponse ERP environments
• Experience in tools such as Smartsheet, Spotfire, Tableau
• Strong project management skills and demonstrated ability to implement and lead sophisticated projects and programs
